headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SIEGLER, LILLIAN R (NEE MENKES)

snippet: SIEGLER--Lillian R (nee Menkes), on January 15, 2016, in her 93rd year. Preceded in death by her loving husband Morton and brother Irwin; Loving mother of Claudia (Joel Auerbach) and William (Maryellen); Beloved Gram to "her girls" Marisa and Steffi (Connie) Auerbach, Willam, Annabelle and Elijah Siegler. Graveside Service Sunday, January 17th at 12:30pm; Mount Moriah Cemetery, Fairview, NJ. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to PBS. 1/3
